summary: Young journalist Sebastian Zöllner is writing an article on artist Manuel Kaminski. Zöllner hopes that Kaminski dies soon, so that he can cash in on his article.
cast: Daniel Brühl|Jesper Christensen|Amira Casar|Geraldine Chaplin|Denis Lavant|Bruno Cathomas|Jördis Triebel|Jan Decleir|Karl Markovics|Viviane de Muynck|Milan Peschel|Stefan Kurt|Josef Hader|Patrick Bauchau|Jacques Herlin|Benjamin de Lajarte|Serge Merlin|Peter Kurth|Andrea Zogg|Axel Neumann|Michael Fuith|Tambet Tuisk|Dorothea Gebhardt|Andrew Dallmeyer|Jo Cameron Brown|Lucie Aron|Luzia Braun|Nikolai Makarov|Anne Morneweg|Karin Pfammatter|Jim Adhi Limas|Martin Langenbeck|Anna Amalie Blomeyer|Charles De Moura|Tanja Fanzun|Jean-Baptiste Filleau|Laetitia Giorgini|Lydia Kavina|Pamela Knaack|Anne Hélène Kotoujansky|Javier Tucat Moreno|Dean Morris|Marc Philipps|Frank Schneider|Marie Simonet|Christian Steyer|Thomas Ulrich|Karen Verbrugge|Steven Weisz|Thomas Wendrich|Desheng Zhou|Daniel Zillmann
title: Ich und Kaminski
